plot: Marina, a young woman from Sao Paulo's country side, goes to the capital to follow her dream of becoming a great actress. An old downtown building called &"Jaqueline Apartment&" is her new home. In the struggle to succeed in the big city, she finds in her neighbors a new true family with whom she creates a strong bond.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Quanto Dura o Amor?
plot_es: Marina, a young woman from Sao Paulo's country side, goes to the capital to follow her dream of becoming a great actress.
